intro.dialog: |C3|She feels one of her [VAL1] tetrids moving.
|C3|The tetrid wants to lead her somewhere.

free_tetrid.dialog_rand1: |C3|She sets the tetrid free and it rolls itself behind a tree.
free_tetrid.dialog_rand2: |C3|The tetrid flies out of her hand and lands in a nearby bush.
free_tetrid.dialog_rand3: |C3|The tetrid jumps out of her heart and bounces into a nearby pond.
free_tetrid.dialog_rand4: |C3|She lets tetrid go and it rolls itself into a hollow log.

free_tetrid.dialog: |C3|There, she finds a Heart Key, but the tetrid is gone.

keep_tetrid.dialog: |C3|She keeps the tetrid safe inside her heart.

leave_key.dialog: |C3|She chooses to leave the key alone.
